ygData.subject: Re: Disallowed characters in Gladiator.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Gladiator? Well, sadly, you can t lay/lie bombs out on the scenario waiting to explode.  Why would I want to do that?  Don t ask.

--- In gladiator@y..., "Deathifier" <storey@t...> wrote:
> Hi,
> Does anyone know if specific characters are not allowed in 
Gladiator?

Well, sadly, you can't lay/lie bombs out on the scenario waiting to 
explode.  Why would I want to do that?  Don't ask.
